import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; function About() { return (

Over the past decade I've worked with hundreds of businesses and business owners to create and impliment digital and physical solutions to help overcome a veriety of obstacles. With these businesses and obstacles ranging from small to large, I've been able to develope and refine a very broad yet related set of creative skills power the day to day. Flexibility and clear communication help keep it all on track.

Below is a brief overview of my experiences and abilities, you could call it a resume. Lastly for those wondering, I'm an awful copywriter.

Cameron
McDougall

hello@cameronmcdougall.eu

Skills

Visual

Front End Development | Graphic + Print Design | UX/UI Design | Typography | Branding + Identity | Layout | Photography

Languages + Frameworks

HTML5 | CSS3 | ES6 Javascript | ReactJS | PHP | WordPress CMS | jQuery | SCSS | Git | NPM | MAMP | WHM + WHMCS

App Proficiency

Sublime Text | Dreamweaver | InDesign | Photoshop | Illustrator | Adobe XD | Bridge | CLI (Mac + Windows) | Google Analytics | Google Ads

Education

City of Glasgow College

HND Computer Arts + Design
Units studied during this course

  • Adv. Software Application
  • Front End Web Design
  • Philosophical Aesthetics
  • Life Drawing
  • Art + Design Adv. Project
  • Observational Drawing
  • Professional Studies
  • 3D Animation

HNC Computer Arts + Design
Units studied during this course

  • Art + Design: Context/Projects
  • Animation: An Introduction
  • Creative Industries
  • Theory + Practice
  • Art + Design: Technologies
  • Compositing + Motion Graphics
  • Developmental Drawing
  • Digital Imaging

Experience

Exacta Print Ltd|Web + Graphic Designer
Feb'17 - Present
My role at Exacta Print has been a busy and varied one. Pridominatly consisting of creating, launching and managing websites from the ground up for businesses small to medium in size. I have gained a wealth of experience within this role, especially in both front end and back end development areas. I played an integral part in modernising Exacta Prints outdated and clunky work flow in the web department and managed to reduce outgoings substancially for several web based services, both b2b and customer facing. I was also given the oppertunity to break up the web work with graphic and print design jobs for customers looking for artwork for their print. In addition to the experience gained with commercial and customer facing web services and projects, I have now have solid experience in agile and fast paced working enviorments, managing unexpected jobs or events and improving workflow and processes.

Freelance|Graphic Designer
Jan'16 - Feb'17
Designing solutions for clients while adhearing to mutually developed briefs. Projects included print and digital materials, web design/creation and indentity/branding creation and development. Through this role, I gained a great deal of experience with face-to-face client relationships, as well as improving on various other skills such as problem solving, critital thinking and negotiation skills.

Royal Mail|Postman
Feb'12 - Feb'17
I worked as part of a larger team to organise and deliver mail throughout Glasgow city centre. During my time with the Royal Mail, I developed strong timekeeping and teamwork skills as well as learning to be more adaptable and flexible in my workflow to help meet ever changing conditions. I also attended quarterly meetings with my manager to assess and analyse the targets and goals that had been set for me at the previous meeting.
